title: Board level stuck at level 6
body: I know the boards don't update that often, but is the level based on summoner level in game, or as a separate entity for posts? If the former, is there a way to force a refresh of the level or something to that effect, and if the latter, no more needs to be said. Thank you in advance for responses! =)

replies.body: So all I need to do is leave a comment and my boards level will automatically sync?
Your profile looks to show as 30 now.  When posting for the first time, your account needs to sync with the boards.  It seems your post here has forced that refresh!
